topics.title: Introduction to Python
topics.content: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability and simplicity. It supports multiple paradigms, including procedural, object-oriented, and functional programming. Python is widely used in web development, automation, data science, machine learning, and more.

topics.title: Python Installation & Setup
topics.content: To install Python, download it from python.org and follow the setup instructions. After installation, verify using: python --version. Use IDEs like VS Code, PyCharm, or Jupyter Notebook to write Python programs.
